short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: CM Helper enhances your cardmarket.com shopping by marking sellers in your cart green and enabling one-click invoice creation.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
CM Helper is an intuitive extension designed to enhance your online shopping experience on cardmarket.com. Streamline your browsing and effortlessly manage your sellers with this handy tool.

Key Features:

- Smart Cart Integration: Automatically marks listings from sellers already in your cart, making it easy to find new items without confusion.

- One-Click Invoicing: Generate invoices for your sales effortlessly with just a single click, saving time and reducing manual work.

- Real-Time Updates: Automatically refreshes markings as you shop, ensuring you always have up-to-date information.


Enhance your shopping journey with CM Helper and save time by identifying preferred sellers and managing your transactions effortlessly. Simplify your cardmarket.com shopping experience today!
